title: Lesson 10: Your Calling at NC
description: The goal of making disciples who make disciples.

blocks.text: The ultimate goal of our growth in Christ is to pour into others what has been poured into us. True discipleship is multiplication: making disciples who will inevitably go and make more disciples.
And what you have heard from me in the presence of many witnesses entrust to faithful men, who will be able to teach others also.
10.1 - As you finish this 200 level series, who is one person you can begin discipling and passing these truths on to?
Who are you currently BLESSing? Who are you praying for and actively moving toward? What is one specific step you are taking this week?
What is one key thing you learned from this lesson?
What is one step you are going to take this week?
What is a prayer request for this week?
